oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Letter from Mary Angeline Edwards Bennett to her son, Pvt. Mack Mitchell Bennett
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pvt. Mack Mitchell Bennett (1892-1951) served in Btry. F, 318th F.A. Regt., 81st Div. during World War I. The letter was written to the soldier during his training at Camp Jackson in South Carolina by his mother, Mary Angeline Edwards Bennett, in Huntingdon, Tennessee. She writes about community events and mentions his brother, Curtis Scott "Bannie" Bennett will have to begin his military service soon.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
